title: Hetah lungngaih kan tuarin
lyrics:
Hetah lungngaih kan tuarin,
Inkhawm hnu kan inthen thin;
Vanah a awm lo vang.

Lawmin kan inkhawm ang,
Lawmin, lawmin, lawmin,
Lawmin kan inkhawm ang,
Kumkhuaa inthen lovin.

Lal Kristan a zuitute,
Van thlengin a hruai ang a;
Thihin a hneh lo vang.

Lal hnena kan awm dawn chuan,
Tihlawm a tul tunah hian;
Hrehawm pawisa lovin.

Kristian inthen mah ila,
Khitah kan awm khawm leh ang,
Darh leh tawh lo turin.

A nawm chin tu nge hre zo?
Lal ropui a lang phak lo,
Van thlen hma loh zawngin.
